headline: Is Cencora (COR) Undervalued? Exploring the Quiet Rally and What It Means for Investors
summary: Cencora (COR) has caught the attention of investors this week, but not because of a single seismic event. Sometimes, the absence of headline-grabbing news is its own story, especially for a company with Cencora’s track record. When the stock quietly moves without a dramatic catalyst, it raises interesting questions about how the market is digesting the business’s fundamentals and future growth potential. Over the past year, Cencora’s share price has delivered a 38% total return, outpacing...
